member.name: IServiceProvider.QueryService
member.summary: Acts as the factory method for any services exposed through an implementation of .
member.param: The unique identifier of the service (an SID).

The address of the caller-allocated variable to receive the interface pointer of the service on successful return from this function. The caller becomes responsible for calling through this interface pointer when the service is no longer required.

member.name: IServiceProvider.QueryService
member.param: The unique identifier of the service (an SID).
The unique identifier of the interface that the caller wants to receive for the service.

The address of the caller-allocated variable to receive the interface pointer of the service on successful return from this function. The caller becomes responsible for calling through this interface pointer when the service is no longer required.

member.name: IServiceProvider
member.summary: Provides a generic access mechanism to locate a GUID-identified service.
